name: Home Pin: How to loot
description:
Help the man to family's home and garden. What you need to do is to pull the pins in the right order, so that the man can take the money, save his wife away from thieves, crazy dogs, ghosts and monsters safely. Unlocking more chapters and more character in the exciting build house story! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!

FEATURE:
- Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
- Suitable for all ages
- Graphic, visual, music & sounds are outstanding
- Use your brain to solve the puzzles
- No time & live limited, enjoy yourself
- Collect gold and build your own garden

Get money and build your garden or buy more character.
